.. _mfp:

Mean free path of ionising photons
==================================
.. image:: ../plots/mfp.png
   :height: 200pt

Data sources
^^^^^^^^^^^^

`Worseck et al. 2014 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`O'Meara et al. 2013 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`Fumagalli et al. 2013 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`Prochaska et al. 2009 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_
